positions.title: Backend Engineer
positions.description: We're looking for an experienced Backend Engineer to design, build, and maintain scalable server-side applications and APIs.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in backend development
Proficiency in Java, Kotlin, Go, or Node.js
Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Strong knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable backend services
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
Collaborate with frontend and mobile teams
Optimize application performance and reliability
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions

positions.title: Frontend Engineer
positions.description: Join our team as a Frontend Engineer to create beautiful, responsive, and performant web applications.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in frontend development
Expert knowledge of React, Vue, or Svelte
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and modern JavaScript
Experience with CSS frameworks (Tailwind, styled-components)
Understanding of web performance optimization
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)
responsibilities: Build responsive and accessible user interfaces
Implement complex UI components and interactions
Collaborate with designers to bring mockups to life
Optimize frontend performance and user experience
Maintain and improve existing codebases

positions.title: QA Automation Engineer
positions.description: We're seeking a QA Automation Engineer to ensure the quality and reliability of our software products through automated testing.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in QA automation
Proficiency in test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright)
Experience with API testing (Postman, REST Assured)
Knowledge of programming languages (Java, Python, or JavaScript)
Understanding of CI/CD integration for testing
Experience with performance and load testing tools
responsibilities: Design and implement automated test frameworks
Write and maintain automated test scripts
Integrate tests into CI/CD pipelines
Identify, document, and track bugs
Collaborate with developers to improve testability

positions.title: Mobile Developer
positions.description: Join us as a Mobile Developer to build innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
requirements: 3+ years of mobile development experience
Proficiency in React Native, Flutter, or native development (Swift/Kotlin)
Experience with mobile app architecture patterns
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and mobile security
Understanding of app store deployment processes
Experience with mobile testing and debugging
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications
Implement new features and optimize performance
Ensure code quality through testing and reviews
Collaborate with backend and design teams
Stay updated with mobile development trends

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
positions.description: We're looking for a DevOps Engineer to build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps/SRE experience
Strong knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible)
Understanding of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools
responsibilities: Design and maintain cloud infrastructure
Implement and optimize CI/CD pipelines
Ensure system reliability and scalability
Automate deployment and operational tasks
Monitor and troubleshoot production systems

positions.title: Cyber Security Engineer
positions.description: Join our security team to protect our systems and data from cyber threats and ensure compliance with security standards.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in cybersecurity
Knowledge of security frameworks (OWASP, NIST, ISO 27001)
Experience with security tools (SIEM, vulnerability scanners)
Understanding of network security and encryption
Familiarity with penetration testing and security audits
Relevant certifications (CEH, CISSP, OSCP) are a plus
responsibilities: Conduct security assessments and penetration testing
Implement security controls and best practices
Monitor and respond to security incidents
Develop security policies and procedures
Train teams on security awareness

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description: We're seeking an experienced Project Manager to lead cross-functional teams and deliver successful projects.
requirements: 4+ years of project management experience
Strong knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies
Experience with project management tools (Jira, Asana)
Excellent communication and leadership skills
PMP or Scrum Master certification is a plus
Technical background in software development
responsibilities: Plan, execute, and deliver projects on time and budget
Coordinate cross-functional teams and stakeholders
Manage project scope, risks, and resources
Facilitate Agile ceremonies and team collaboration
Report project status to leadership

positions.title: UI/UX Lead
positions.description: Lead our design team in creating exceptional user experiences and beautiful interfaces for our products.
requirements: 5+ years of UI/UX design experience
Expert proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Strong portfolio showcasing web and mobile designs
Experience with design systems and component libraries
Understanding of user research and usability testing
Knowledge of frontend development is a plus
responsibilities: Lead and mentor the design team
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Establish and maintain design systems
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with product and engineering teams
